place_description: Nestled in the heart of Charlotte, NC, Gotcha Matcha & Espresso is not just your average coffee shop; it's a haven for those seeking a delightful blend of traditional and modern coffee and tea creations. Our passion for quality, creativity, and commitment to serving the finest beverages sets us apart as a unique and inviting destination for caffeine aficionados and tea enthusiasts. Our coffee shop's menu is a fusion of classic and innovative flavors. From rich, handcrafted espresso beverages to vibrant and earthy matcha concoctions, there's something to please every palate.

reviews_data.review_text: Great place overall and wonderful service. However, it's very overpriced and my drink was not what I expected. Taste like milk and favor syrup but no matcha. Looking at other pictures of customers drinks were dark green and mines look like a lot of milk and ice.
The staff are super friendly!! Everyone should visit if they're in charlotte and want some bomb matcha!!!
amazing!! fantastic matcha and fantastic staff :) was in charlotte for only a week and went multiple times. my fav was the pandan matcha latte
Panda Eric & GM Brad chill af, 10/10
Great matcha, the pastries are a little expensive but they taste very great as well.
Greatest Matcha in the uptown area! They have tons of flavor combos & great bagels -- Loved the experience.

came into town to visit and stopped here one morning and im still thinking about the drink i had it was amazing! there are so many options and the owner is so kind and knowledgeable. can't wait to see more locations open up :)
This place is awesome! I love the blueberry matcha. The young man who works here has superb customer service.. 10/10.
Awesome spot the treats and the ube latte were absolutely amazing!
Great London Fog and very nice ppl and atmosphere
First matcha from Gotcha Matcha, their Panda (most popular). Definitely understand why! Love the atmosphere, quick service, and most of all, Delicious! Gotcha matcha will be my new regular!

I cannot say enough wonderful things about this lovely little matcha spot! If you want delicious matcha made by an amazing soul GO HERE. Like run. Their sweet treats are so delightful, drinks heavenly. But the best part was the owner's personality. Such a sweet, sparkly, energetic and knowledgeable soul. Id give 10 stars if I could. Much love.
On gang this the best matcha on the block. Every time I go here I'm greeted with a smile.
Definitely a VIBE & will be a returning customer ! Owner (Eric) engaged & made the experience #WorthIt

# Review: Gotcha Matcha - A Warm Haven of Excellence



Eric, the owner of Gotcha Matcha, has created something truly special. Stepping in from the cold North Carolina weather, I was immediately welcomed by his warm, genuine hospitality. His passion for matcha is evident in every aspect of the experience.

The matcha latte I ordered was absolutely perfect - expertly crafted with precise attention to temperature and technique. The rich, complex flavors were beautifully balanced, creating a comforting and luxurious drink that exceeded all expectations.

What truly sets this place apart is Eric's dedication to customer service. His knowledge and enthusiasm for matcha is contagious, and he takes the time to ensure each customer has an exceptional experience. His friendly demeanor and attention to detail make visiting Gotcha Matcha feel less like a transaction and more like being welcomed into someone's home.

If you're seeking the perfect matcha experience in North Carolina, look no further. Eric has mastered both the art of matcha preparation and the art of hospitality. This is more than just a tea shop - it's a destination for anyone who appreciates quality, craftsmanship, and genuine care.
- Kayla Kaull

No matter how many matcha places I try, I always find myself coming back to Gotcha Matcha! They have such a great variety of unique matcha options--my personal favorites are the blueberry, coconut, and ube matcha. It's also one of the few places that offer a large cup option, which is perfect for a matcha lover like me.

Yes, they are a little on the expensive side, but it's absolutely worth it. The quality is unmatched, and the staff is always consistent and friendly. They even make the effort to remember returning customers, which makes the experience that much better.

Oh, and if they have it, do yourself a favor and try the red velvet cookie--it will literally change your life! Highly recommend this spot for all matcha enthusiasts
Fantastic drinks and great service from the owner!

Stumbled upon this matcha place and was pleasantly surprised. I ordered the Caramel Matchiato and it was exactly what I thought it'd be -- Iced matcha with caramel drizzle (unsure if it had caramel syrup though). The matcha itself was delicious and light; I probably would have been better off getting just a plain iced matcha (latte). The caramel drizzle didn't taste artificial but it was a tad too sweet.

It I ever get the chance, I'll definitely stop by here again!
Amazing service! Ceremonial grade matcha to whatever your palate wants. You will not be disappointed.

After going there 7 times in the past 2 weeks, I think I can provide a truthful reveal. This is the best matcha you will ever taste! Not only variety in flavors and quality ingredients but everyone that works there is so fun and helpful! Can't recommend enough.
The Somalian barista at the front was so sweet and the blueberry matcha she recommended was delicious !! Will definitely come here again soon

Came here 3 times in a week. The owner is super friendly and best Matcha I've had hands down. Favorite was The Panda (Pandan) matcha the flavors paired so well no overwhelming the matcha or overpowering it. Big fan of the blueberry one as well. Can't wait to come back

If you've never tried Matcha or want to give it a second chance, look no further.
The matcha I previously had made me think Matcha was so gross, but I gave this place a try & my mind has completely changed. Their Matcha is so delicious and they have many varieties/flavors. I tried the caramel matchiato Matcha Iced and absolutely loved it. The drinks were awesome, the service was great, and the location was very chill.
I stopped by to try this place. I got a delicious coconut oat milk latte. It's the perfect amount of sweetness. Will be returning for my office day pick me up.
my mini home away from home. I get all my work done there while also getting to connect with others. Everything is dairy free, so I love it.
Great experience! Eric gave us amazing customer service. I will definitely come back.
Love, love, love the service from Eric!!! Great recommendations and vibe!
Unique flavors and everything we got tasted great. Great service too.
Oh soooo delicious and amazing atmosphere

Hands down one of the best matchas I've ever had. They perfectly mastered the art of making matcha. You can taste the high quality ingredients and perfect craft of every latte they make. We got the seasonal pumpkin spice Matcha latte and the panda Matcha latte and both of them were absolutely delicious but that pumpkin spice Matcha latte was one of the best Matcha latte I've had in my life. Also it's super cute inside and how can you not love the panda themed everything?! 10/10 would recommend coming to this place to get your work done or relax and enjoy one of the best matchas you've ever had.

Also the service is the best I've ever had, super nice funny and helpful!
Soooo good! Great service! I got the Panda Matcha and it was delicious!
Just visited Gotcha Matcha for the first time and I was blown away. The owner Eric (?) was super energetic and knowledgeable and their product is light and refreshing. I will be returning.
Owner is amazing and personable. The drinks are wonderful with sooo many options! If you're in the area, definitely check them out!!
super amazing staff but the decor is very millennial. not planning on returning- will stick to tous le jour and matcha maiko
Best quality matcha in charlottemade by the most wholesome human bean.
Nice downtown respite, tasty tea. Owner's super nice, unparalleled energy.
Great ube flavor!
The best matcha drink I've had in Charlotte! Lots of options and the staff is super helpful.
Hands down the best matcha in the city. The owner is the sweetest, coolest vibe. Love going in here
The best matcha I had since I've been in Charlotte to be honest. and I'm very picky lol. The cafe is cute and the owner and staff are very kind
My drink was amazing!! Eric was very kind and made my drink perfectly!!
My new favorite cafe! Best matcha drinks and great friendly staff! Definitely recommend it
All I ever got from Starbucks was their matcha latte, so it's awesome to have a local place to support with drinks that are even better. Have enjoyed everything I've tried so far.
The best Matcha in Charlotte! The owner is so nice and the drinks are beautiful!
Excellent matcha tea! Staff was extremely friendly and knowledgeable about the complexities of real matcha. We had the The Panda and a The Pandan Macchiato. We'll be back.

Such a great addition to a building that runs on coffee! I've tried three different drinks this week and they're all so yummy! The pandan caramel macchiato was delicious! I didn't process that it'd be a dirty matcha, but I'm so glad I ordered it!

One of the best matcha drinks I've tried. Loved the iced dirty matcha. Don't mix it, move the straw to taste all the layers. Love the panda dude, he's super charismatic and funny. Vibes are the best. I came to work here for several hours.
Wonderful experience, nice people, great atmosphere, and great matcha!

The employees are so sweet at this location and this has very quickly become my regular place. The matcha drink selection is wonderful and if you don't like matcha there are coffee options that are wonderful as well!
I got the pandan caramel macchiato and it was amazing! So clean and the staff is super nice! The ube cookie was delicious too
Perfect place! Great coffee and matcha. Worth the visit!
Customer service is out of this world and every drink on the menu is a MUST try!
Such a cute shop!! Awesome coffee and amazing cookies!
Love this addition to uptown! So glad it's a great afternoon matcha/coffee option. The owner is so sweet and knowledgeable.
The food and drink were both delicious, and the staff was super friendly. Highly recommend!

I love they have a matcha or espresso option for everything on their menu! I got a cool fall breeze latte with matcha instead of espresso. It's also right across the street from where I work, so I will definitely be back!
The strawberry matcha tastes amazing
Gotcha Matcha is fantastic. I needed a pick me up and I got the Cool Fall Breeze which was creamy and smooth. So happy I met Eric he's Great!
Such a cute vibe and AMAZING matcha! Def will come back when I'm in CLT!
Briefly popped in for a matcha to go. The drink was delicious and I couldn't have asked for anything more.

Coconut matcha is delicious! Ube cinnamon roll was so fresh
Great atmosphere and friendly service
This place was amazing !! I couldn't find it the location and the owner met me in the parking lot. The matcha was amazing and the favor of lavender.... Highly recommended!!!
It was our first time at Gotcha Matcha & it was delicious. The owner was super friendly. He keeps the place is very clean!
Delicious matcha and amazing service.
Best matcha I've ever ordered

Soooo good! This was a great addition to our trip to Charlotte. Eric was amazing and introduced us to some delicious Matcha flavors. The Ube Matcha is my new favorite thing. It was so good, we came back the next day.
Super friendly guy! Amazing matcha and a great space.
Great matcha fun atmosphere. If you're in Charlotte and looking for a unique place for a pick me up check out Gotcha Matcha.
Panda man is amazing! The pandan matcha is to die for! You need to try this place! Highly recommend!!!!
What a fun time! Great drinks!

Stopped in due to being in the area and needed a little pick me up! Came in 20 min before close, but received the best service from the individual working. Rather than feeling like a burden due to close to closing time, felt welcomed. Very knowledgeable! Got the iced coconut matcha with oat milk. DELICIOUS!
Amazing matcha and such friendly staff! In a nice coworking space. The panda drink is amazing!

Can't say enough good things about this place or recommend it highly enough. It's as good as it looks. The drinks were amazing, and the pandas and ube cinnamon buns were some of the best i've ever had; very light and fluffy but also gooey and unique. The matcha was very good quality. They have a flying sim and a racing sim and it's good for working or studying. 10/10

Matcha drinks: tasty with lots of flavors (pandan, ube, lavender)
Wi-Fi name and password: Tabbris WiFi and "Tabbris2019!"
Vibe/ambiance: Startup space/gamer/high tech event space with disco ball included, but it's actually a co-working space.
Parking: limited, free one hour parking (longer if not busy), or street parking
Seating: Plenty.
Should you try this place? Yes.
Bathrooms: Decent sized men's and women's room. Family/all gender bathroom as well.
Service: Friendly and upbeat, the owner is one of the baristas and very passionate about matcha

The owner of Gotcha Matcha wears a cute panda head and he's so friendly and knowledgeable about matcha.

I tried the iced coconut matcha with oat milk  on his recommendation and it was so delicious! I also got a warm ube cookie and that was also so yummy.

Gotcha Matcha is a hidden gem located inside a co-working space right next to the former Lincoln's Haberdashery space. There's a small parking lot in the front of the building.

I can't wait to go back!
Eric is the best!!

A bit difficult to find, as it's located inside a co working space, but its actually a chill spot a little off the beaten path. I ordered an iced Panda and an ube cookie, and it was served by the friendliest barista I have ever come across. Both were delicious, and worthy of a return visit, especially since this place is great to just sit and relax in. The co working space is interesting, and as far as I know, if you get a drink, you can just chill and enjoy the space...they even have comfy chairs and a couple gaming stations set up for a flight simulator and Xbox!

This is such a cute little spot! I came early in the morning at 7:30 a.m., right as they opened  to be able to grab a treat before I went to work. This is located in like a business work space type pf center. You walk in all the way to the back, and you will find Gotcha Matcha & the famous panda head! I decided to try the Hazelnut Latte with Oatmilk, and it was delicious! It was not overly sweet and tasted strong just how I liked it! I was able to get a free cookie, and it was delicious! Super sweet, though, so if you're not a fan of sweet, this may not be for you. Great location! There are parking spaces right in front of this location. I'm not sure how busy it may be during lunchtime.
This place is great! I've had the pandan latte, strawberry matchiato, and all of the pastries. Everything was great!
This place is awesome! Eric the owner is so friendly and welcoming. He is very knowledgeable and passionate. There is a huge space to be able to work with a great atmosphere too!

Love this place. The staff are friendly and personable. Beautiful selection of drinks. Of course I got the Matcha! Can't wait to try all the other drinks!!!!
Same great matcha! New location and new sweet treats!

It doesn't matter wha the venue is, Gotcha Matcha HAS YOU! So thankful I saw the sign on South Blvd and made the stop. Menu was explained and all my questions were answered. I asked if an item would be good with a fruit add in and was told "let's try it!" And I was not disappointed.
Delicious drinks and good vibes.
Absolutely love it here!! Best place to get matcha

Eric is very knowledgeable and passionate about matcha! My family and I had such a wonderful experience! We enjoyed The Panda, To The Yams, and The Hojicha with Coconut! Everything was so delicious with amazing service! I highly recommend visiting Gotcha Matcha! I will be back soon! :)
The owner is so down to earth and friendly! The Matcha and Refresher was so GOOD!
High quality ceremonial grade matcha and a very kind, enthusiastic barista
Best matcha i've had and the owner Eric is the sweetest!!!

The owner's customer service, engagement, and knowledge/expertise of products was outstanding! It was early and I NEEDED caffeine! He got me right with a DIRTY MATCH (matcha tea with a double shot of expresso!!!) He not only made it sweet like it must have it but it was delicious! GREAT EXPERIENCE AND I DEFINITELY WAS CAFFINATED LOL.
Eric is great. Drinks are great. Highly recommend
Best matcha I've ever had and their cinnamon rolls are amazing!
I love this shop! The customer service is so personalized and the owner is down to earth. People come in and sit and chat while enjoying their drinks. I sat for 2 hours just enjoying the energy.
The best matcha & Eric is fabulousssss!!!!
eric was really sweet, and the drinks are amazing!
The service was warm and welcoming! I ordered the Gingerbread Matcha Latte and it was so good. A true 10 out of 10 coffee shop!
This is great!

Absolutely love this place! The owner and barista was very welcoming as a new customer. They made us our drinks and gave out great recommendations. We had the vanilla latte and toasted marshmallow matcha. 10/10 will recommend. Can't wait to go to their new location.
Super sweet owner! Very friendly atmosphere, great customer service and overall vibe!  I had the toasted marshmallow matcha latte and the pandan cinnamon roll.  Both were delicious!
Great hospitality, beautiful decor and the drinks were delicious!
The owner was great! I enjoyed everything that I tried there!
Super cute place, very warm and inviting customer service, and the espresso was top-tier!
I loved the Ube cookies and so does my toddler! I want to try the Ube cinnamon roll sooo badly
Best Matcha around!
The Pandan Carmel macchiato is the best drink ever!! Great atmosphere, 5 stars

Not exaggerating in the least bit. It was the best matcha I've ever had in my life. The two guys working it were very charismatc. The only downside to it is its location. The parking was a headache but that's all of Charlotte so I can't let that affect it too much.
Will be coming back! The atmosphere and drinks are amazing here! Will be recommending this place to my friends. The owner was super friendly! I hope they get a permanent place soon.
This is a great place, Eric was so friendly and very informative! The vibe in her is awesome!!! GO SUPPORT THIS BLACK OWNED BUSINESS!!!!
I've been looking for a good matcha spot and this pop up really made it for me. The matcha is with oat milk and really good. I hope they continue to stay open.
All 5s across the board!!! Customer service was just as great as the drinks! Got the "To the Yams" and "The Panda" and the flavors did not disappoint! Definitely check them out!
It's a great spot to stop, I'm not a morning person but to take a moment and break in the morning here makes the day go by just a little faster
I never considered a soda combination of matcha and lavender before. Very unique and paired well with the delicious pandem and ube cinnamon roll!
This spot is a nice location within Southend. The owner is super nice and friendly. I would check it out if you love matcha and ube!
The best matcha

Love the team as soon as I walked in! Great atmosphere, Great location, Great food, Great matcha!!!

I had the Ube cinnamon roll with the Pandan Icing. 10/10. Literally falls apart and soft all around like a pillow! Absolutely in loveee.

Also had the Lav, 10/10. Mellow, flavorful and the lavender hits just right. A fav so far.

Eric and Leshenga gave us the most unique experience we've ever had! They were so friendly and creative and down to earth. The drinks were delicious and the pandan was great! We even recorded a podcast with them in their seating area! Definitely check them out!

I have gotten drinks here a few times and absolutely love it. Pandan and Matcha flavors are difficult to balance, but each time I've gotten the panda drink, it tastes perfect. The atmosphere is very chill and comfortable, and Eric (owner) and the workers are very friendly. Highly recommend Gotcha Matcha as a place to grab some drinks and hang out.

Ever since coming back from Hawaii a year ago, I've been in love with Ube so when I saw a suggestion about going to Gotcha Matcha for ube drinks, I was sold. The ambiance, the service, the thought into every menu item was worth it! I got two drinks because they were both Ube flavored and the matcha was fantastic, but the Ubesso, was hands down the best drink I've had in a LONG time. Can't wait for y'all to have your own place!
Loved the owners! The pandan cinnamon roll and and Panda matcha were delicious! I hope they stick around

Loved meeting these folks and they encouraged me to try the oat milk (as a non-oat drinker... regular milk only) and said they wouldn't charge me if I hated it.   I trusted the process and the drink was delicious.  Give them a try!!
Loved everything about it!

I've been a fan of matcha since I was younger and when I heard there was another matcha (and vegan) cafe that was opening in Charlotte I was really excited to try it out. Staff and service was nice and they seem like lovely people. The interior was very chic and reminded me a hotel lobby or bar area.

Now onto the drink. I got the iced gotcha matcha latte which is just a regular matcha latte. All their drinks automatically come with oat milk but they have other alternatives like soy, macadamia, coconut, etc. Being completely honest, the matcha flavor was not very present, it mostly tasted like oat milk with a very small splash of matcha. Color wise, it was a very faint green color and when I received my drink, I could already tell it wasn't going to be as strong as other matcha lattes that I've had. I've been going to Matcha Maiko Cafe and they have a more distinct matcha flavor.

Personally I think this place is great for those who are new to matcha and want to try a caffeine alternative other than coffee. It wasn't my cup of tea but could be yours!
Place looked nice but the drinks were terrible.
Really great drinks and wonderful service! Would definitely come again!

The Panda (Pandan matcha) and the Lav (lavender matcha) were both 10/10. We also had the Pandan cinnamon roll and now we're looking for an apartment above this place. Everything was made super fast and fresh and the service was warm. A must visit if you're anyway near south end or uptown!

I loved trying Gotcha Matcha for a mid-morning drink! I needed something with low
Caffeine and the owner made me a special concoction of the lemongrass drink with no matcha. It was really flavorful and delicious, next time I'd love to try it with the matcha too.
My drink was great. The staff was awesome, I'll definitely be back.

First time ever trying matcha and idk what I've been waiting for !!!! Im just hoping Gotcha Matcha doesn't have me waiting too long for the brick and mortar after this 90 day Pop up because I need Match in my life forever!!!! I got the Pandan and Ube Cinnamon Roll and they both were AMAZING ! I'll be back for sure !
Man the best latte I ever had very unique in flavors and multiple ways to get verse traditional latte amazing service
Staff was very friendly and the drink I got was high quality. Would come again!

Came on their soft opening day and had their Ube (Yam) and PANDAN lattes. The flavor is just right with the matcha, very balance and you can taste the flavor being highlighted.

The owner and his staff are so knowledgeable and passionate in matcha that their energy alone are a good pick me up if you need a light caffeine or treat fix throughout your day!
I got the dirty matcha and it was super delicious! It's hard to find good dirty matchas around Charlotte but Gotcha Matcha did it right! I will definitely be back!
Gotcha Matcha made me into a match lover! The best matcha I have ever had. Try The Panda. It was amazing!

Visited first thing in the morning during their soft opening. Got the matcha latte (hot), Pandan iced, and iced Ube drinks. Drinks were good and they use oat milk by default. We also got an Ube cinnamon roll which was great as well. As the other reviewer mentioned, their pop-up lease term is only for 90 days. Hoping to be back again and wishing them the best.

Their menu is a decent size. Will be trying the Hojicha next time.

Absolutely amazing service with even better matcha!! I got the Pandan (iced) and it was so good my tongue did a little dance. My only complaint is that this pop up is only for 90 days. I can't wait to come back and get myself a little tote bag!!
